item.text: In those days Israel had no king. There was a Levite living temporarily in the remote region of the Ephraimite hill country. He acquired a concubine from Bethlehem in Judah.

However, <st data-num="06370" class="">she</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="02181" class="">got angry</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">at</st> him<n id="2" /> and <st data-num="01980" class="">went</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">home</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> her <st data-num="01" class="">father’s</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">in</st> <st data-num="01035" class="">Bethlehem</st> in <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st>. When she had <st data-num="01961" class="">been</st> <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st> <st data-num="03117 0702">four</st> <st data-num="02320" class="">months</st>,

her <st data-num="0376" class="">husband</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">came</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0310" class="">after</st> her, hoping he could <st data-num="01696 05921 03820">convince</st> her to <st data-num="07725" class="">return</st>.<n id="2" /> He brought <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> him his <st data-num="05288" class="">servant</st><n id="3" /> and a <st data-num="06776" class="">pair</st> of <st data-num="02543" class="">donkeys</st>. When she <st data-num="0935" class="">brought</st> him into her <st data-num="01" class="">father’s</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> and the <st data-num="05291" class="">girl’s</st> <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> <st data-num="07200" class="">saw</st> him, he <st data-num="07125" class="">greeted</st> him <st data-num="08055" class="">warmly</st>.<n id="4" />

His <st data-num="02859" class="">father-in-law</st>, the <st data-num="05291" class="">girl’s</st> <st data-num="01" class="">father</st>, <st data-num="02388" class="">persuaded</st> him to <st data-num="03427" class="">stay</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> him for <st data-num="07969" class="">three</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">days</st>, and they <st data-num="0398" class="">ate</st> and <st data-num="08354" class="">drank</st> together, and <st data-num="03885" class="">spent the night</st> <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st>.

<st data-num="01961 07243">On the fourth</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> they <st data-num="07925 01242">woke up early</st> and the Levite <st data-num="06965" class="">got ready</st> to <st data-num="01980" class="">leave</st>.<n id="1" /> But the <st data-num="05291" class="">girl’s</st> <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> his <st data-num="02860" class="">son-in-law</st>, “<st data-num="05582 03820">Have</st> a <st data-num="06595" class="">bite</st> to <st data-num="03899" class="">eat</st> <st data-num="05582 03820">for some energy</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="0310" class="">then</st> you can <st data-num="01980" class="">go</st>.”

So the <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> of them <st data-num="03427" class="">sat down</st> and <st data-num="0398 08354">had a meal</st> <st data-num="03162" class="">together</st>.<n id="1" /> Then the <st data-num="05291" class="">girl’s</st> <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st>, “<st data-num="02974 04994">Why not</st> <st data-num="03885" class="">stay</st> another <st data-num="03885" class="">night</st> and <st data-num="03190 03820">have a good time</st>?”<n id="2" />

When the <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> <st data-num="06965" class="">got ready</st> to <st data-num="01980" class="">leave</st>,<n id="1" /> his <st data-num="02859" class="">father-in-law</st> <st data-num="06484" class="">convinced</st> him to <st data-num="03885 08033">stay</st> <st data-num="07725" class="">another</st> <st data-num="03885 08033">night</st>.<n id="2" />

He <st data-num="07925" class="">woke up early</st> in the <st data-num="01242" class="">morning</st> on the <st data-num="02549" class="">fifth</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> so he could <st data-num="01980" class="">leave</st>, but the <st data-num="05291" class="">girl’s</st> <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="05582 04994">Get</st> some <st data-num="03824" class="">energy</st>!<n id="1" /> <st data-num="04102" class="">Wait</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> <st data-num="05186" class="">later</st> in the <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> <st data-num="04102" class="">to leave</st>.”<n id="2" /> So they <st data-num="0398" class="">ate a meal</st> <st data-num="08147" class="">together</st>.

When the <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> <st data-num="06965" class="">got ready</st> to <st data-num="01980" class="">leave</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="01931 06370">with his concubine</st> and his <st data-num="05288" class="">servant</st>,<n id="2" /> his <st data-num="02859" class="">father-in-law</st>, the <st data-num="05291" class="">girl’s</st> <st data-num="01" class="">father</st>, <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> to him, “<st data-num="02009 04994">Look</st>! The <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> <st data-num="07503" class="">is</st> <st data-num="06150" class="">almost</st> <st data-num="07503" class="">over</st>.<n id="3" /> <st data-num="03885 04994">Stay</st> another <st data-num="03885 04994">night</st>! <st data-num="02009" class="">Since</st> the <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> <st data-num="02583" class="">is over</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="03885" class="">stay</st> another <st data-num="03885" class="">night</st> <st data-num="06311" class="">here</st> and <st data-num="03190 03824">have a good time</st>. You can <st data-num="07925" class="">get up early</st> <st data-num="04279" class="">tomorrow</st> and <st data-num="01980" class="">start</st> your <st data-num="01870" class="">trip</st> <st data-num="0168" class="">home</st>.”<n id="5" />
But the man did not want to stay another night. He left and traveled as far as Jebus (that is, Jerusalem). He had with him a pair of saddled donkeys and his concubine.
When they got near Jebus, it was getting quite late and the servant said to his master, “Come on, let’s stop at this Jebusite city and spend the night in it.”

But his <st data-num="0113" class="">master</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> him, “We should <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="05493" class="">stop</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">at</st> a <st data-num="05237" class="">foreign</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">where</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">non</st>-<st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st> <st data-num="02008" class="">live</st>.<n id="1" /> We will <st data-num="05674" class="">travel</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">on to</st> <st data-num="01390" class="">Gibeah</st>.”

He <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> to his <st data-num="05288" class="">servant</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="01980" class="">Come on</st>, we will <st data-num="07126" class="">go</st> into <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> of the other <st data-num="04725" class="">towns</st><n id="2" /> and <st data-num="03885" class="">spend the night</st> in <st data-num="01390" class="">Gibeah</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> <st data-num="07414" class="">Ramah</st>.”

So they <st data-num="05674" class="">traveled</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">on</st>,<n id="1" /> and the <st data-num="08121" class="">sun</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">went down</st> when they were <st data-num="0681" class="">near</st> <st data-num="01390" class="">Gibeah</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">in the territory</st> of <st data-num="01144" class="">Benjamin</st>.<n id="2" />
They stopped there and decided to spend the night in Gibeah. They came into the city and sat down in the town square, but no one invited them to spend the night.

But then an old man passed by, returning at the end of the day from his work in the field. The man was from the Ephraimite hill country; he was living temporarily in Gibeah. (The residents of the town were Benjaminites.)

When <st data-num="05869" class="">he</st> <st data-num="05375" class="">looked up</st> and <st data-num="07200" class="">saw</st> the <st data-num="0376 0732">traveler</st><n id="1" /> in the <st data-num="05892" class="">town</st> <st data-num="07339" class="">square</st>, the <st data-num="02205" class="">old</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="0575" class="">Where</st> are you <st data-num="01980" class="">heading</st>? <st data-num="0370" class="">Where</st> do you <st data-num="0935" class="">come</st> from?”

The Levite<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> him, “<st data-num="0587" class="">We</st> are <st data-num="05674" class="">traveling</st> from <st data-num="01035" class="">Bethlehem</st><n id="2" /> in <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="03411" class="">remote region</st> of the <st data-num="0669" class="">Ephraimite</st> <st data-num="02022" class="">hill country</st>. That’s <st data-num="08033" class="">where</st> <st data-num="0595" class="">I</st>’m from. I <st data-num="01980" class="">had business</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">in</st> <st data-num="01035" class="">Bethlehem</st> in <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st>, but now <st data-num="0589" class="">I</st>’m <st data-num="01980" class="">heading</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">home</st>.<n id="3" /> But <st data-num="0369" class="">no</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">one</st> has <st data-num="0622" class="">invited</st> me into their <st data-num="01004" class="">home</st>.

We <st data-num="03426" class="">have</st> enough <st data-num="08401" class="">straw</st> <st data-num="01571" class="">and</st> <st data-num="04554" class="">grain</st> for our <st data-num="02543" class="">donkeys</st>, <st data-num="01571" class="">and</st> <st data-num="03426" class="">there is</st> enough <st data-num="03899" class="">food</st> and <st data-num="03196" class="">wine</st> for me, your <st data-num="0519" class="">female servant</st>,<n id="1" /> and the <st data-num="05288" class="">young man</st> who is <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> your <st data-num="05650" class="">servants</st>.<n id="2" /> We <st data-num="04270" class="">lack</st> <st data-num="0369 03605 01697">nothing</st>.”

The <st data-num="02205" class="">old</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="07965" class="">Everything is just fine</st>.<n id="1" /> I will <st data-num="07535 05921">take care of</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> your <st data-num="04270" class="">needs</st>. <st data-num="07535" class="">But</st> <st data-num="0408" class="">don’t</st> <st data-num="03885" class="">spend the night</st> in the <st data-num="07339" class="">town square</st>.”
So he brought him to his house and fed the donkeys. They washed their feet and had a meal.

They were having a good time, when suddenly some men of the city, some good-for-nothings, surrounded the house and kept beating on the door. They said to the old man who owned the house, “Send out the man who came to visit you so we can take carnal knowledge of him.”

The <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> who <st data-num="01167" class="">owned</st> the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> <st data-num="03318 0413">went outside</st> and <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> them, “<st data-num="0408" class="">No</st>, my <st data-num="0251" class="">brothers</st>! <st data-num="0408 04994">Don’t</st> <st data-num="07489" class="">do</st> this <st data-num="07489" class="">wicked</st> thing! <st data-num="0310" class="">After</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">all</st>, <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">is a guest</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">in</st> my <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>. <st data-num="0408" class="">Don’t</st> <st data-num="06213" class="">do</st> <st data-num="02063" class="">such</st> a <st data-num="05039" class="">disgraceful thing</st>!

<st data-num="02009" class="">Here</st> are my <st data-num="01330" class="">virgin</st> <st data-num="01323" class="">daughter</st> and my guest’s<n id="1" /> <st data-num="06370" class="">concubine</st>. I will <st data-num="03318 04994">send</st> them <st data-num="03318 04994">out</st>, and you can <st data-num="06031" class="">abuse</st> them and <st data-num="06213" class="">do</st> to them <st data-num="02896" class="">whatever</st> you <st data-num="05869" class="">like</st>.<n id="2" /> But <st data-num="03808" class="">don’t</st> <st data-num="06213" class="">do</st> <st data-num="02063" class="">such</st> a <st data-num="05039" class="">disgraceful</st> <st data-num="01697" class="">thing</st> to <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st>!”

The <st data-num="0582" class="">men</st> <st data-num="03808 014">refused</st> to <st data-num="08085" class="">listen</st> to him, so the <st data-num="0376" class="">Levite</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="02388" class="">grabbed</st> his <st data-num="06370" class="">concubine</st> and <st data-num="03318" class="">made</st> her <st data-num="03318" class="">go</st> <st data-num="0413 02351">outside</st>.<n id="2" /> They <st data-num="03045" class="">raped</st><n id="3" /> her and <st data-num="05953" class="">abused</st> her <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="03915" class="">night</st> long <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> <st data-num="01242" class="">morning</st>. They <st data-num="07971" class="">let</st> her <st data-num="07971" class="">go</st> at <st data-num="05927 07837">dawn</st>.

The <st data-num="0802" class="">woman</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">arrived</st> back at <st data-num="06437 01242">daybreak</st> and was <st data-num="05307" class="">sprawled</st> out <st data-num="05307" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="06607" class="">doorstep</st> of the <st data-num="01004 0376">house</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">where</st> her <st data-num="0113" class="">master</st><n id="1" /> was <st data-num="08033" class="">staying</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> it became <st data-num="0216" class="">light</st>.<n id="2" />

When her <st data-num="0113" class="">master</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="06965" class="">got up</st> in the <st data-num="01242" class="">morning</st>, <st data-num="06605" class="">opened</st> the <st data-num="01817" class="">doors</st> of the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>, and <st data-num="03318" class="">went outside</st> to <st data-num="01980" class="">start on</st> his <st data-num="01870" class="">journey</st>, <st data-num="02009" class="">there</st> was the <st data-num="0802" class="">woman</st>, his <st data-num="06370" class="">concubine</st>, <st data-num="05307" class="">sprawled out</st> on the <st data-num="06607" class="">doorstep</st> of the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> with her <st data-num="03027" class="">hands</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="05592" class="">threshold</st>.

He <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> her, “<st data-num="06965" class="">Get up</st>, let’s <st data-num="01980" class="">leave</st>.” But <st data-num="0369" class="">there was no</st> <st data-num="06030" class="">response</st>. He <st data-num="03947" class="">put</st> her <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="02543" class="">donkey</st> and <st data-num="06965 0376 01980">went</st> <st data-num="04725" class="">home</st>.<n id="1" />

When he <st data-num="0935 0413">got</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">home</st>, he <st data-num="03947" class="">took</st> a <st data-num="03979" class="">knife</st>, <st data-num="02388" class="">grasped</st> his <st data-num="06370" class="">concubine</st>, and <st data-num="05408" class="">carved</st> <st data-num="06106" class="">her</st> <st data-num="05408" class="">up</st> into <st data-num="08147 06240">twelve</st> <st data-num="05409" class="">pieces</st>.<n id="1" /> Then he <st data-num="07971" class="">sent</st> the pieces <st data-num="03605" class="">throughout</st> <st data-num="01366 03478">Israel</st>.<n id="2" />
Everyone who saw the sight said, “Nothing like this has happened or been witnessed during the entire time since the Israelites left the land of Egypt! Take careful note of it! Discuss it and speak!”
